thread.title: Americans Should Be More Financially Literate. But What Does That Mean?

author: Benjamin Harris
title: Americans Should Be More Financially Literate. But What Does That Mean?
text:
Benjamin Harris (@econ_harris) is a visiting associate professor at the Kellogg School of Management and was the Chief Economist to Vice President Joe Biden. The high cost of subpar financial literacy became painfully clear over the past decade. From precarious mortgages that helped precipitate the financial crisis to sky-high interest rates on payday loans to […]
